value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|King Njörðr, do you know anything
about the condition Heiðr is
suffering from?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Though she has my light and remains
pure, her situation will not remain so
for much longer.$k$pShe is ensnared in the coils of the
Golden Seer's curse, and it gnaws
away at her...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Then, unless we defeat Gullveig...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|You must not act rashly, Seiðr.
If you were to face her now, you
would die. It would be in vain.$k$pSurely you know this as well
as I do.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I understand. But even so, I...I have
to save her.$k$pPlease, King Njörðr, tell me what
I can do.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|You will require the power of my Ár,
which I will grant you.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Y-you will?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|The Ár is the source of my power,
but as you know, it is not currently
in my possession.$k$p$EFace_Anger|It was stolen from me...by my
insolent fool of a sister, Nerþuz.$k$pYou must go to the Land Temple,
where she is keeping it. There, you
must recover and return it to me.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|I understand, King Njörðr.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|You must be sure to return the Ár
to me. It is the only way you can
defeat Gullveig.$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Let's be off, children of Midgard.
I will be your guide...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|Seið! Please, let me join you.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-Heiðr, no!$k$pYou must allow yourself time to rest
and recover.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Pain|Rest will not rid my body of this
curse, Seiðr.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|Please, I beg you. Let me come.
I will keep out of trouble. I promise.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Might I speak with you,
$Nu?$k$p$EFace|I'm sorry for forcing you all to
embark on this dangerous journey.$k$pIt's just that...I want to spend time
with my sister—while I'm still able.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I may not have much time left
to do so...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Ah. Forgive me. That is not what
I wanted to speak to you about.$k$pI actually...hoped to get to know
you a bit better.$k$pYou are the one chosen to receive
my sister's revelation, after all.
You are a special person.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Seiðr is very kind. If something
happens to me...she may be
overcome with emotion.$k$pI am happy to mean so much to her,
as she means so much to me, but
imagining her sad... It will not do.$k$p$EFace_Smile|So please, if the time comes, I ask
that you be there to comfort
her, $Nu.$k$pIf she will have you to turn to, I may
rest assured that there is no need
to worry.$k$p$Sbs150|
